name: Monopoly Plus
notes:
Steam and UPlay may not close properly (just end or kill them manually).
Online mode might not work.
DXVK 0.95 and later result in a crash after a certain short time.
Proton 3.16-7 Beta (most likely earlier too) result in a crash after pressing [â†µ].
content:
game:
  appid: 562810
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
